gurmukhi: ਦੇਸ ਅੳੁਰਿ ਬਿਦੇਸ ਕੀ ਠਕੁਰਾੲਿ ਦੈ ਸਭ ਮੋਹਿ ||
transliteration: Des Aur(i) Bides Kithakuraae Dai Sabh Moh(i)||
translation: “When you will grant me the ruling power over the inland and foreign countries,

gurmukhi: ਸੱਤ ਸੀਲ ਸਤੀ ਜਤ ਬ੍ਰਤ ਤੳੁ ਪਛਾਨੋ ਤੋਹਿ ||੨੦੧||
transliteration: Satt Seel Satijat Brat Tau Pachhaado Toh(i)||201||
translation: “Then I shall consider you the observer of truthfulness and recognizer of righteousness.”201.

gurmukhi: ਪਾਪਨੀ ਬਨ ਰਾਮ ਕੋ ਪੈਹੈਂ ਕਹਾ ਜਸ ਕਾਢ ||
transliteration: Paapaniban Raan Ko Padhhain Kahaa Jas Kaadh||
translation: The king replied, “O sinful woman ! What approbation you will gain by sending Ram to the forest?

gurmukhi: ਭਸਮ ਅਾਨਨ ਤੇ ਗੲੀ ਕਹਿ ਕੈ ਸਕੇ ਅਸਿ ਬਾਢ ||
transliteration: Bhasam Aanan Te Gadkah(i) Kai Sake As(i) Baadh||
translation: “By such surpassing utterance of yours the ash of magnificence on my forehead has flown down with the upcoming perspiration.”

gurmukhi: ਕੋਪ ਭੂਪ ਕੁਅੰਡ ਲੈ ਤੁਹਿ ਕਾਟੀਅੈ ੲਿਹ ਕਾਲ ||
transliteration: Kop Bhoop Kuand Lai Tuh(i) Kaateeai Eh Kaal||
translation: The king taking his bow in his hand said this angrily, “I would have chopped and thrown you just now,

gurmukhi: ਨਾਸ ਤੋਰਨ ਕੀਜੀਅੈ ਤਕ ਛਾਡੀਅੈ ਤੁਹਿ ਬਾਲ ||੨੦੨||
transliteration: Naas Toran Keejeeai Tak Chhaadeeai Tuh(i) Baal||202||
translation: “And destroyed you, but I let you go because you are a woman.”202.

gurmukhi: ਨਰ ਦੇਵ ਦੇਵ ਰਾਮ ਹੈ || ਅਭੇਵ ਧਰਮ ਧਾਮ ਹੈ ||
transliteration: Nar Dev Dev Raam Hai|| Abhaav Dharam Dhaam Hai||
translation: “The superb god amongst men is Ram who is certainly the abode of Dhrma,

gurmukhi: ਅਬੁੱਧ ਨਾਰਿ ਤੈ ਮਨੈ || ਬਿਸੁੱਧ ਬਾਤ ਕੋ ਭਨੈ ||੨੦੩||
transliteration: Abuddh Daar(i) Tai Mania|| Bisuddh Baat Ko Bhanai||203||
translation: “O foolish woman ! why are you uttering such contrary words?203.

gurmukhi: ਅਗਾਧਿ ਦੇਵ ਅਨੰਤ ਹੈ || ਅਭੂਤ ਸੋਭਵੰਤ ਹੈ ||
transliteration: Agaddh(i) Dev Anant Hai|| Abhoot Sobhvant Hai||
translation: “He is unfathomable and infinite god and is highly seated beyond all elements.

gurmukhi: ਕ੍ਰਿਪਾਲ ਕਰਮ ਕਾਰਣੰ || ਬਿਹਾਲ ਦਿਅਾਲ ਤਾਰਣੰ ||੨੦੪||
transliteration: Kridaal Karam Kaaranan|| Bdhaal Diaal Taaranan||204||
translation: “He is merciful and kind towards all and mercifully gives support to helpless and ferries them across.204.

gurmukhi: ਅਨੇਕ ਸੰਤ ਤਾਰਣੰ || ਅਦੇਵ ਦੇਵ ਕਾਰਣੰ ||
transliteration: Anek Sant Taaranan|| Adev Dev Kaaranan||
translation: “He is the saviour of many saints and is the basic cause of the gods and demons.

gurmukhi: ਸੁਰੇਸ ਭਾੲਿ ਰੂਪਣੰ || ਸਮਿੱਧ੍ਰ ਸਿੱਧ ਕੂਪਣੰ ||੨੦੫||
transliteration: Sures Bhaae Roopanan|| Samiddhra Siddh Koopanan||205||
translation: “He is also the king of gods and is the store of all powers.”205.

gurmukhi: ਬਰੰ ਨਰੇਸ ਦੀਜੀਅੈ || ਕਹੇ ਸੁ ਪੂਰ ਕੀਜੀਅੈ ||
transliteration: Baran Dares Deejeeai|| Kahe Su Poor Keejeeai||
translation: The queen said, “O king ! Grant me the boons and fulfil thy sayins.
